Posts.Title: 3 days post bilat with recon twogirls twogirls

Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2008 10:53AM mylildarlins wrote: Hi there!  This is my first post and I'm so glad to see your post and know I'm not the only one going through this!  I just had my bilat mast on 1/7, drains taken out exactly one week later, but this pressure from the tissue expanders is driving me crazy!  I go in to my PS one week from today for my first fill and I'm so nervous about that and what it will feel like.  Right now my left side feels great, but my right side with certain movements and positioning, I feel a tugging sensation and even feel the saline shifting....ugghhh!!  The PS's nurse said I would most likely have the tissue expanders in until sometime summer, probably late summer.  I'm trying to be strong, but it's hard sometimes.  Anyway, just wanted to say hi and I'm so glad to see others here who can relate :)  Take care! Lisa
